title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors Slumping, Dray's $25k Fine + a Bradley Beal Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors Slumping, Dray's $25k Fine + a Bradley Beal Interview
description:
To start episode 18 of ‘The Draymond Green Show’ Dray discusses the Warriors slump since he’s been back, his ejection and subsequent fine from the Warriors game against the Spurs, and LeBron making history and dunking on his former teammate Kevin Love. Then Washington Wizards guard Bradley Beal joins the show to discuss his rehab from wrist surgery, his outlook on his upcoming free agency, how the Washington Wizards should be building, how to process the massive dollar value of his potential extension, comparing John Wall and Russell Westbrook, and how good he thinks Jayson Tatum can be.

Produced by: Jackson Safon

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
